title: "Exploration Gallery"
subtitle: "Visual Record of LLM-Guided Connectivity Recovery"

## UCB Exploration Tree

The LLM navigates the parameter space using **Upper Confidence Bound (UCB) tree search**. Each node represents a configuration; edges represent mutations. The tree grows as the LLM explores new regimes and exploits promising branches.
